Author: GitHub
Description:
"It was abundantly clear that you had to be open source." Anders Hejlsberg reveals the internal struggle at Microsoft to make TypeScript an open-source project. He explains why a commercial, closed-source approach would have failed and how moving to GitHub in 2014 finally helped the project take off.

#AndersHejlsberg #TypeScript #OpenSource

Title: Why TypeScript had to be open source
